name: Insigno Quipment Technologies
overview:
Insigno Quipment works on Research & Development in the area of Taxi Fleet Management. Taxi fleet management systems are extensively used across Europe.

Two young entrepreneurs had a concept in mind about the Taxi Fleet Management way back in the year 2002. This concept was realized into a hot selling product with full service support to the taxi industry in Europe under the name â€œQuipment Group BVâ€. Quipment thus started its operations in The Netherlands (Holland) from 2002 and has been delivering consistently high quality products and services to the taxi operators throughout Europe, now for more than 9 years. Quipment, today, has reached the Top spot in the global business of taxi management services.

Quipment Group BV expanded its operations in India from August 2010 under the name â€œInsigno Quipment Technologies (India) Pvt. Ltd.â€ in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. Insigno Quipment Technologies focuses on Research & Development on Taxi industry products and caters to other automotive product domains.

Quipment Group BV has more than 45 Quipmates in The Netherlands along with round-the-clock service staff to ensure reliable, consistent and high quality customer support for all their products and services. Insigno Quipment Technologies currently has a team of 30 Quipmates and this number would expand to 60 Quipmates by the end of second financial Quarter of 2011.
